title: praNava nAdamenum
language:
caraNam  
caraNam 1  				(rAgA:  gambhIranATa, Adi tALA) praNava nAdamenum paramporuLAm karuNaiySl indap-pArinil isaiyin
aruNanAi uditta aNNal sEvaDikkut-taruNa mAmalarin anjali vaippAm
 caraNam 2  				(rAgA:  Arabhi, Adi tALA) yAgamum shIlamum nirai rAmabrahmamAm yOgiyin magavAik-kAviri nATTinil
bhOgamum poruLum rAma bhakti enakkoNDa tyAgarAjap-peyarAl sadguru vandanarE
 caraNam 3  				(rAgA:  bilahari, Adi tALA) vEDamuni tAn mILa viLangiDumArena bhUtalamuraindanar puNNiyarE nAl
vEdamum nUlgaLum viLangiDap-payinrE nAda narkkalaiyinil nATTam miguttArE

 caraNam 4   soNTi enum tiruvENkaTa ramaNap-paNDitar pAl isai payinrarE 
eNDisaiyum pugazh Era migu pADalgaL vi
